title: Anbe Anbe Lyrics Idhu Kathirvelan Kadhal Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Anbe Anbe
Singers: Harish Raghavendra, Harini
Movie: Idhu Kathirvelan Kadhal 
Music: Harrish Jeyaraaj
Lyrics : Thamarai
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Anbe anbe, ellaam anbae
unnakkaaga vandhen ingae
sirithaale podhum endren.
mazhaikkalam kannil mattum
vendaam enbaen.
Panikkaala porvai kondu vandhen. (2)

En mejai meedhu poonkoththai
En mejai meedhu poonkoththai
vaithathu needhaaney.
naan vaanam paarkka valiseidha
saalaram needhaaney.
En idhayam mella sidhayil thalla
neethaan nilaavai
kaati thaettrinai..(Anbe anbe...)

Thookkam kannil varavillai
soppanam kaana valiyillai.
Engao paadal kettaalum
nenjil munpol theeyillai.

Mazhai tharum kaarmugiley
nee midhandhidum mayiliragey.
idham tharum innisaiye
nee olitharum en dhisaiye.

Irupadhu oruyire
adhu urugiye karugiradhey.
ninaivugal tharuvadhanaal
manam marupadi sarigiradhey.
(Anbe anbe...)

Unnai paarkka koodaadhu
endru kannai moodi kondaalum.
kannai pirithu nee vandhaai
imaigalin naduvinil nee ninndraai.

Unnidam solvadharkku
en kadhai pala kathirikku.
iru kanngalain thandhigalaal
adhai kadathida sol edharkku.

Udaigalin nerthiyinaal
indha ulaginai vendraval nee.
siru udhatin punnagaiyaal
en idhayathil nindraval nee.

Anbe anbe, ellaam anbae
unnakkaaga vandhen ingae
sirithaale podhum endren.
mazhaikkalam kannil mattum
vendaam enbaen.
Panikkaala porvai kondu vandhen. (2)

En mejai meedhu poonkoththai
En mejai meedhu poonkoththai
vaithathu needhaaney.
naan vaanam paarkka valiseidha
saalaram needhaaney.
en irullum mella vilagi chella
neethaan nilaavai
kaati thaettrinai..

I tried my best :)
everything is my love
i came here for you
its enough if you keep laughing
saying no to tears in your
eyes, i brought
 winter bedsheet for you.

A flower pot on my table.
you kept a flower pot
on my table.
you paved a way
to see the sky.
when I am depressed,
you consoled me by showing
the moon   (everything is my love..)

no sleep in eyes
no way for dream
no fire in heart on listening
to a song.

you’re a cloudy weather giving rain
a feather floating in sky
a pretty good music
a light on my path.

I have only one soul,
freezing to death
coz of giving thoughts
my mind is falling dull.
(everything is my love..)

Even if i close my eyes
to stop seeing you.
you’ll come and stand
between my eyes.

there’re lot of stories
to share with you.
say our eyes to
share them.

you’ve won this world
with your dressing sense.
you stood in my heart
with you pretty smile.

everything is my love

 winter bedsheet for you.
